description:
Kawachi’s dough won’t ferment despite his best efforts and he collapses after become exhausted. What could have been the cause? Does South Tokyo stand a chance against such foul play?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fukutsu no Toushi!! Gyakkyou o Bane ni Tachi Agare!
Indomitable Fighting Spirit!! Let Adversity Bring You to Your Feet!
Un esprit inébranlable ! Fais face à l`adversité !
ความตั้งใจมุ่งมั่น ลุกยืนหยัดได้บนอุปสรรค!
不屈の闘志!! 逆境をバネに立ち上がれ!
